issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

On an older 3g iphone, which does not support multi-tasking operations, when the Titanium.Facebook.authorize() is called, the application crashes. The same app will function fine on any device which is capable of switching to the background.

{html}
fields.summary: New Facebook Module Crashes on non multi-tasking device 1.6 RC1

comments.body:
{html}

[INFO] XML Load event 2011-02-18 22:08:13.798 LDS Youth[4054:5103] bool _WebTryThreadLock(bool), 0x66ec7f0: Tried to obtain the web lock from a thread other than the main thread or the web thread. This may be a result of calling to UIKit from a secondary thread. Crashing now...
[INFO] Application has exited from Simulator

{html}
Closing ticket as there has been no progress over the past 6 years. Please file a new ticket if there are any further problems.
